issue.title: [CF 179] Reactive ability and Fakehidden have Problem
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Reactive ability
when the icon in cooldown it's still shown.

``` { ["ManaCheck"] = true, ["ShowTimer"] = true, ["Type"] = "reactive", ["RangeCheck"] = true, ["Enabled"] = true, ["Name"] = "Revenge", ["UseActvtnOverlay"] = true, }, ```

2. FakeHidden
FakeHidden may not be hidden in sometimes
i leave the config mode,the icon still shown,and i change my stance,it's will be hidden,but in combat icon also shown.
sorry for my bad english -.-

``` { ["ManaCheck"] = true, ["ShowTimer"] = true, ["Type"] = "cooldown", ["Conditions"] = { { ["Type"] = "STANCE", ["Level"] = 1, }, -- [1] { ["Type"] = "STANCE", ["AndOr"] = "OR", ["Level"] = 3, }, -- [2] }, ["RangeCheck"] = true, ["FakeHidden"] = true, ["Enabled"] = true, ["Name"] = "Pummel", ["CooldownShowWhen"] = "always", }, ```

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
R48

Awesome mod. Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #179 | Raw
